amendment.description: To modify the requirements for certifications made prior to the initiation of certain acquisitions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3912 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 37 - 60. Record Vote Number: 16.

action.text: Amendment SA 3912 proposed by Senator Feingold to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S641-644; text: CR S641) To modify the requirements for certifications made prior to the initiation of certain acquisitions.
